roleset.name: stagnate,
roleset.note: STAGNATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'stagnate' based on sentences in financial subcorpusand automatic expansion via verbnet. (from stagnate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: stagnate-v: going nowhere, fast
example.text: Applied, then a closely held company, was stagnating under the management of its controlling family.

under the management of its controlling family

example.name: stagnation-n
example.text: The stagnation of hourly wages is the most important economic issue facing most American families
